General.Name: Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group Inc
General.Description: Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, crafts, designs, and executes digital marketing strategies for various ad platforms and social media networks in the United States and Great Britain. The company provides pay-per-click advertising, search engine marketing and optimization, web design, social media, digital analytics, and advisory services. Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 845 Third Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10022
